languages.text: "Туда, где единение противоположностей вызывает распад. Распад, что обернется созиданием, когда из обломков утратившего смысл воздвигнутся чертоги святости, угодные Ему..." {n}Голос Кибеллы неуловимо меняется — словно ритуальная молитва в устах ее обернулась любовной песней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Туда, где единение противоположностей вызывает распад — распад, что обернется созиданием, когда из обломков утратившего всякий смысл воздвигнутся чертоги святости, угодные Ему..." {n}Голос Кибеллы неуловимо меняется — словно ритуальная молитва в устах ее обернулась любовной песней.{/n}

languages.text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Туда, где единение противоположностей вызывает распад. Распад, что обернется созиданием, когда из обломков утратившего смысл воздвигнутся чертоги святости, угодные Ему..." {n}Голос Кибеллы неуловимо меняется — словно ритуальная молитва в устах ее обернулась любовной песней.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse. A collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer has somehow transformed into a love song.{/n}

"Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse. A collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer has somehow transformed into a love song.{/n}

"Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

"Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

languages.text: "Wo das Zusammenfügen von Gegensätzen zu einem Zusammenbruch führt, einem Zusammenbruch, der zu einem Akt der Schöpfung wird: Aus den Ruinen der Bedeutung werden sich heilige Hallen erheben und er wird es mit Wohlwollen sehen ..." {n}Ihr Tonfall verändert sich leicht, als würde sich das rituelle Gebet irgendwie in ein Liebeslied verwandeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wo das Zusammenfügen von Gegensätzen zu einem Zusammenbruch führt, einem Zusammenbruch, der zu einem Akt der Schöpfung wird: Aus den Ruinen der Bedeutung werden sich heilige Hallen erheben und er wird es mit Wohlwollen sehen ..." {n}Ihr Tonfall verändert sich leicht, als würde sich das rituelle Gebet irgendwie in ein Liebeslied verwandeln.{/n}

languages.text: «Donde la unión de los opuestos provoca un colapso, un colapso que será un acto de creación: de las ruinas del significado se alzarán salones sagrados, y Él estará complacido...». {n}Su tono cambia sutilmente, como si la oración ritual se transformara de alguna forma en una canción de amor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Donde la unión de los opuestos provoca un colapso, un colapso que será un acto de creación: de las ruinas del significado se alzarán salones sagrados, y Él estará complacido...». {n}Su tono cambia sutilmente, como si la oración ritual se transformara de alguna forma en una canción de amor.{/n}

languages.text: 「相反するものの結合が崩壊を生み、その崩壊が創造の行為となる。真意の廃墟から神聖な聖堂が姿を現し、主はお喜びになる…」{n}彼女の声音がかすかに変化する。まるで儀式の祈りがいつの間にかラブソングに変ってしまったかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「相反するものの結合が崩壊を生み、その崩壊が創造の行為となる。真意の廃墟から神聖な聖堂が姿を現し、主はお喜びになる…」{n}彼女の声音がかすかに変化する。まるで儀式の祈りがいつの間にかラブソングに変ってしまったかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “前往彼此对立的结合引起崩坏的地方，这样的崩坏会带来创造。在含义的废墟之中，神圣的殿堂将会拔地而起，不死之神无比欣悦……”{n}她的语气发生了微妙的变化，仿佛仪式的祈祷变成了某种爱情的歌谣一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “前往彼此对立的结合引起崩坏的地方，这样的崩坏会带来创造。在含义的废墟之中，神圣的殿堂将会拔地而起，不死之神无比欣悦……”{n}她的语气发生了微妙的变化，仿佛仪式的祈祷变成了某种爱情的歌谣一样。{/n}

languages.text: « Là où la réunion des contraires engendre un effondrement qui deviendra acte de création : des salles sacrées se dresseront sur les ruines du sens, et Il sera satisfait... » {n}Vous percevez un changement subtil dans son ton, comme si la prière rituelle se transformait en chanson d'amour.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Là où la réunion des contraires engendre un effondrement qui deviendra acte de création : des salles sacrées se dresseront sur les ruines du sens, et Il sera satisfait... » {n}Vous percevez un changement subtil dans son ton, comme si la prière rituelle se transformait en chanson d'amour.{/n}

languages.text: "Zıtlıkların birleşiminin çöküşe yol açacağı yere. Bu çöküş ki bir yaratılış eylemine dönüşecek. Anlamın harabelerinden kutsal salonlar yükselecek ve O memnun olacak..." {n}Ses tonu, ayin duası âdeta bir aşk şarkısına dönüşüyormuşçasına keskin bir şekilde değişiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Where the joining of opposites begets a collapse, a collapse that will become an act of creation: from the ruins of meaning, sacred halls will rise, and He will be pleased..." {n}Her tone changes subtly — as if the ritual prayer were somehow transforming into a love song.{/n}
